description: Deletes a permission group. This action is irreversible.

parameters.name: permissionGroupId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the permission group that you want to delete.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A token that ensures idempotency. This token expires in 10 minutes. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: permissionGroupId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the deleted permission group.
